'''The Prey''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all enemies
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=2-4}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* The hilichurls can be found surrounding a [[boar]]. The boar can be slain for [[Raw Meat]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Upon triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon:''' Whew, these hilichurls look like the mega-strong types.
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon wonders if this is a hunting party...
:'''Paimon:''' We can't let them get away with being a menace to the people round here.
{{Dialogue End}}
